subject: Football
Federal Taxes (US)
lead_paragraph: A federal judge ruled that the former Denver Broncos linebacker Bill Romanowski could be forced to pay about $5 million in back taxes because of a horse-breeding scheme he said he got caught up in.
snippet: A federal judge ruled that the former Denver Broncos linebacker Bill Romanowski could be forced to pay about $5 million in back taxes because of a horse-breeding scheme he said he got caught up in.
